contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 2, 1975 D Manchester District Contest (Fourth Section)
Manchester District Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Manchester District Contest manchester-district-contest-fourth-section
Own Choice from a Specified List
The Seasons [Carr]
Radisson Blu Edwardian Manchester Hotel, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £25 and shield, 2nd £15 and shield, 3rd £10 and cup, 4th £7.50p and trophy. Contest run as an experiment - all three sections played in one pre-drawn contest with a choice of three test pieces per section. 10 bands competed.
Jan. 11, 2014, 10:41 a.m. Dec. 17, 2016, 10:19 a.m.
1 Flixton Band Paul Crashley The Seasons [Carr]
2 Water Band Rossendale G. Dodge The Gay Delavals
3 Burnage Manchester Brian Gilbert The Seasons [Carr]
4 Hollingworth C. Griffith The Seasons [Carr]
5 Haslingden & Helmshore Band D. Jennings The Gay Delavals
6 Gorton Silver Band J. Tennant Fancy Free
7 Windsor Salford J. Clayton The Seasons [Carr]
8 Trafford Band J. Woodward The Seasons [Carr]
9 Ashton-under-Lyne Band Jack Butler The Seasons [Carr]
10 Droylsden & District Fred G. Green The Seasons [Carr]
